channel.title: Hamachi help. needs updating
channel.description:
right i click the symbol for hamachi to install it... then this comes up
i click yes (tried clicking no once too)
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img123.imageshack.us/img123/9954/hamachisk4.png[/img][/URL]
then that comes up. but if i click no... it dont come up ..and nothing else does either..
ive tried deleting it..then installing agen,. but dont wrk..
any help plz ?

item.title: Hamachi help. needs updating
item.dc:creator: @wicksy wicksy
item.description:
@wicksy wrote:

Same problem happened to me … Download the new hamachi from the site - (https://secure.logmein.com/US/products/hamachi2/download.) Then run the install file click uninstall when you run it then re open the install file and install as normal O and also when u uninstall make shure u have the delete all user info or whatever un checked or all ur info will be gone drr … Hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi help. needs updating
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“trebel9, post:2, topic:6578”]hamachi is a fail no-ip rocks.[/quote]Geez, your posts get less and less useful every one I see.

I’m thinking you deleted Hamachi before by right-clicking the Hamachi program files folder? And Hamachi seems like the type of program to check your registry, which would say you still have it installed (because you only deleted the folder, not the registry entries).

I’m not exactly sure if that’s right, but shrug

Try going into Programs or whatever it’s called, where you can uninstall them, and look for Hamachi. I’m not sure if that would be there, but worth a shot.

My only 2 cents.

Read full topic
